types:type.name: payment
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type payment = {| DebtorBank: String, DebtorAcct: String, CreditorBank: String, CreditorAcct: String, Sum: Number {"typeId": "double"}, Currency: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"DebtorBank\":\"RBC\",\"DebtorAcct\":\"333-savings\",\"CreditorBank\":\"BOA\",\"CreditorAcct\":\"777-checking\",\"Sum\":397.00,\"Currency\":\"USD\"}"}
